item.title: Interactive maps from Xeno-Canto recording localities in xc_maps()
item.description: The function xc_maps() from the R package warbleR let users visualize the geographic spread of recordings from Xeno-Canto downloaded through the quer_xc() function. However, the graphs are static, which becomes a bit painful when looking at many recordings. Fortunately the R package leaflet allows to create interactive maps in which users can zoom in at specific areas, check observation medatada and link observations to their Xeno-Canto webpage. This capability is now available in xc_maps().
